org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser

Class JenaModelSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.oxm.support.AbstractMarshaller
      • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser.JenaModelSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.oxm.Marshaller, org.springframework.oxm.Unmarshaller

    public class JenaModelSerializer
extends org.springframework.oxm.support.AbstractMarshaller
    Spring (Un)marshaller for Jena Model instances. (Un)marshalling from input and output streams are supported, but currently DOM and SAX are not. A JenaModelFactory must be supplied on construction, which supplies configured Model instances for deserialization.
    See Also:
    Reading and Writing RDF in Apache Jena, Model.read(InputStream, String, String), Model.write(OutputStream, String, String)
